strapiPost.title: Teach Me How to HR
strapiPost.content:
HR is a key component to any business, but it can be difficult to manage, especially for small businesses. My HR Professionals takes care of the HR and payroll needs of customers across the nation, acting as their HR departments.

  • Much to learn, you have: My HR Professionals is looking to pass along some of its wisdom to businesses in the area with its upcoming event - Teach Me How to HR.
  • The deets: The lunch event, held at Home2 Suites in Springdale, will take place on Aug 19 from 12-3p.

If you or your company need to brush up on your HR knowledge, you can register for the event HERE.
